summary: An ordinance ratifying, confirming and approving the published advertisement of the City Comptroller of call for bids for bonds of the City of Seattle in the sum of $500,000, voted at an election held March 5, 1912, under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 28753 ratifying and confirming acceptance of the City of Seattle, by its Resolution No. 3679, of the bid of E. H. Rollins & Sons of Chicago, Illinois, for said bonds, and declaring an emergency.
